s.text: The important work we do with community-based organizations, schools and churches is only limited by the financial resources we're able to raise.
The important work we do with community-based organizations, schools and churches is only limited by the financial resources we're able to raise.
With your help, there will be more success stories like those we mentioned above.
With your help, there will be more success stories like those we mentioned above.
With your help, there will be more success stories like those we mentioned above.

For a contribution of $250 or more, we will send you a signed, 16 x 20 limited edition print by local artist Cami Forsell, showing the dedication of the Shepherd Community linear park mentioned in this letter!

For a contribution of $250 or more, we will send you a signed, 16 x 20 limited edition print by local artist Cami Forsell, showing the dedication of the Shepherd Community linear park mentioned in this letter!
24,000 community volunteers pick up 2 million pounds of litter, plant 1,200 trees and paint 50 homes for the poor and elderly.
Thanks in advance for your gift, and for helping us "Keep Indianapolis Beautiful!"
If you'd like to make a donation at a later date, please indicate your pledge on the invoice and return it to us.
In November, we sent you a letter asking you to include us in your 1999 budget.
